summary: Defines an abstract base renderer for neural radiance field (NeRF) models, encapsulating common initialization, data forwarding, and stepâ€‘update utilities that concrete renderer subclasses can inherit and extend.
business_intent: Provide a reusable, modular foundation for building custom NeRF rendering components within the NVIDIA NeMo multimodal framework, streamlining development and integration of neural rendering pipelines.
